title: The Real Life of a Diplomat, Told Like a Novel
description: George Packer talks about “Our Man: Richard Holbrooke and the End of the American Century,” and Lori Gottlieb discusses “Maybe You Should Talk to Someone.”
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
